2020 films expectations

03 Jan 2020

My most anticipated films for the coming year, difficultly ranked with the few informations we have so far.
Let's see at the end of 2020 if this list will match my reviews.

  1. Dune Dec., by Denis Villeneuve
  2. Tenet Jul. 22, by Christopher Nolan
  3. Lucy in the Sky Mar., by Noah Hawley
  4. 1917 Jan. 15, by Sam Mendes
  5. Bios by Miguel Sapochnik, music by Gustavo Santaolalla, post-apo w/ Tom Hanks
  6. Eternals Nov., by Chloé Zhao - Marvel
  7. Underwater Jan. 9, by William Eubank w/ Kristen Stewart
  8. Mank by David Fincher, w/ Gary Oldman - Netflix
  9. No Time to Die Apr., Cary Joji Fukunaga - James Bond
  10. The Tomorrow War Dec., by Chris McKay w/ Chris Pratt
  11. The Witches Oct., by Robert Zemeckis
  12. Soul June, by Pete Docter - Disney/Pixar
  13. Good Morning, Midnight by and with Clooney
  14. West Side Story Dec., by Steven Spielberg
  15. Onward Mar., by Dan Scanlon - Disney/Pixar
  16. A Quiet Place Part II Mar. 20, by John Krasinski
    Trailer
  17. The King's Man Feb., by Matthew Vaughn
  18. Raya and the Last Dragon Nov. - Disney
  19. Black Widow May, by Cate Shortland - Marvel
  20. Sonic the Hedgehog Feb., by Jeff Fowler
  21. Birds of Prey: And the Fantabulous Emancipation of One Harley Quinn Feb., by Cathy Yan - DCEU
  22. Ghostbusters: Afterlife July, by Jason Reitman
  23. Eurovision by David Dobkin, w/ Will Ferrell, Rachel McAdams, Pierce Brosnan - Netflix
  24. Wonder Woman 1984 June, by Patty Jenkins - DCEU
  25. Godzilla vs Kong Mar.
  26. Fast & Furious 9 May, by Justin Lin
  27. Top Gun: Maverick July, by Joseph Kosinski
  28. Morbius Sony/Marvel, w/ Jared Leto
  29. Mulan - Disney
  30. Bloodshot Feb., w/ Vin Diesel
  31. Venom 2 Oct., by Andy Serkis - Sony’s Marvel
  32. Monster Hunter by Paul W.S. Anderson
